p.s: As a lot of pollution refers to human activity, humans will be able to stop pollution.
In the following I'm going to suggest feasible measures to help solving the global problem of environmental pollution.
In my opinion, everyone should keep solving the problem of environmental pollution, because we're all affected by it.
But I also think that when everyone gets involved, it won't be necassarynecessary to get back in time and live without cars and such.
At first, every human should be schooled in the causes and effects of environmental pollution, because it will help finding measures to tackle the problem.
Second, we must overthink our behavior with shopping and buying.
We should only buy what we need to save ressources.
At last, it's important to repair and recycle products such as clothes or furniture, which is also associated with buying less.
Finally, I don't think we have to fear the climatic changes, but it's necassarynecessary to tackle the problem to save lives and habitat of both humans and animals.
